author: marioevz
content:
Check it out: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/610/files#diff-5696aa881fcd5f3dc4f7861e9207c4fbc8512acd6843e5840cfb9b2f13366f43

Created a marker to produce the same test both in legacy and EOF V1 modes. File linked is an example of a single simple test, and the only modification needed was to add a `STOP` at the end of the bytecode.
